from_file.description: Is the structure a path to a file?

charge_method.description: Charge method: gas, bcc (default), user (user's charges in mol2 file)

net_charge.description: Net molecular charge (int), for gas default is 0

atom_type.description: Atom type, can be gaff or amber (AMBER99+SB), default is gaff

engine.description: Engine: tleap (default) or sleap (not fully matured)

outtop.description: Output topologies: all (default), gmx, cns or charmm

max_time.description: Max time (in sec) tolerance for sqm/mopac, default is 10 hours

chiral.description: Create improper dihedral parameters for chiral atoms in CNS

direct.description: Amb2gmx mode, does a direct conversion, for any solvent

disambiguate.description: Disambiguate lower and uppercase atomtypes in GMX top file

cnstop.description: Write CNS topology with allhdg-like parameters (experimental)
